title: Hong Kong police declare Apple Daily newsroom a crime scene as editors and executives arrested under national security law
content:
1. Hong Kong police declare Apple Daily newsroom a crime scene as editors and executives arrested under national security law  CNN
  2. Apple Daily: Hong Kong police raid offices of pro-democracy paper, make arrests  Fox News
  3. 5 Apple Daily executives arrested under Hong Kong security law | Cheung Kim-hung | WION English News  WION
  4. Hong Kong Police Arrest Apple Daily Executives  The New York Times
  5. Hong Kong police arrest five at pro-democracy newspaper Apple Daily  FRANCE 24 English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 香港警察がApple Daily社のニュースルームを犯罪現場と断定、編集者と幹部が国家安全保障法で逮捕される
香港警方宣布《苹果日报》新闻编辑室为犯罪现场，编辑和高管根据国家安全法被捕
香港警方宣佈《蘋果日報》新聞編輯室爲犯罪現場，編輯和高管根據國家安全法被捕
